name: Little Red (illuminesce)
description:
Once upon a time, there lived a little girl and her mother in a house by the woods. The mother, gray-faced and sullen, was hardworking and practical. She desired nothing more to live out the rest of her days with her only daughter. Her daughter, however, dreamt of a world much bigger than their own; a world beyond their austere house and dark woods.

An interactive horror game based on the story of Little Red Riding Hood. There are four total endings—can you play through them all?

Programming+story by illuminesce. Please do not reproduce/host without my permission.
